definition: 7th earthly branch: 11 a.m.-1 p.m., noon, 5th solar month (6th June-6th July), year of the Horse/ancient Chinese compass point: 180° (south)

sentences.english: Once more, Cinderella's fairy godmother reminded her to be home by midnight.
sentences.chinese: 仙女教母再一次提醒辛德瑞拉要在午夜前到家。

sentences.english: Need to make your midnite bathroom appointments more exhilarating?
sentences.chinese: 想让你午夜的浴室之约更加愉悦吗？

sentences.english: I jotted down stray thoughts and memories in the middle of the night.
sentences.chinese: 我将午夜无眠时零散的思绪和记忆随手记下。

sentences.english: We crossed the state boundary at midnight.
sentences.chinese: 我们在午夜穿过了州界。

sentences.english: It wants twelve minutes of midnight.
The Premier announces that state-run petroleum company will raise gasoline prices from midnight.
sentences.chinese: 总理宣布，国营石油公司将从午夜起调涨汽油价格。

sentences.english: Polypropylene enclosure finished in textured midnight blue.
sentences.chinese: 聚丙烯箱体，午夜蓝粗质外表。

sentences.english: The party fizzled out before midnight.
sentences.chinese: 参加聚会的人在午夜前作鸟兽散。

sentences.english: Our sky chart shows the bright waxing gibbous moon and the planet Jupiter for around mid-evening tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今日的星图展示了午夜前后明亮的凸月和木星。

sentences.english: A congregation in Vorkuta gathers to celebrate Easter at a midnight Mass.
sentences.chinese: 沃尔库塔会众在午夜弥撒上团聚，庆祝复活节。

sentences.english: At stroke of midnight God shall win.
sentences.chinese: 现在始与上帝斗，午夜帝胜他归乡。

sentences.english: Upon midnight, loving words are exchanged below the coconut trees.
sentences.chinese: 若午夜互诉情话于椰树下。

sentences.english: As a result, networks will be rerunning some late-night talk shows and soap operas.
sentences.chinese: 结果是，网络将播放一些午夜脱口秀和肥皂剧。

sentences.english: Did the movie go on until midnight?
If she won't be here before midnight, there's no need to rush.
sentences.chinese: 如果午夜前她不来，没必要赶得很紧。

sentences.english: They arrived in Beijing at midnight and checked into Beijing Hotel.
sentences.chinese: 他们于午夜抵达北京并登记住进北京饭店。

definition: time/period during the day/one of the 12 two-hour periods enumerated by the earthly branches 地支
very early in the morning/in the wee hours
in the evening/when night falls/towards evening/at night fall/at dusk
midnight/in the middle of the night
